front.title: SS7 MTP2-User Adaptation Layer (M2UA) SS7 Test Specifications M2UA-SS7TEST

abstract.t: This Internet-Draft provides information for the Internet community on the implementation of test cases for testing the SS7 MTP2-User Adaptation Layer [M2UA] Signalling Gateway (SG) based on the conformance test specifications for SS7 MTP Level 2 [Q.780], [Q.781], [M2PATEST07].
